short_description: From the rugged Patagonia to the vibrant cities of Santiago and Valparaiso, Chile is a country that offers a diverse range of experiences for every traveler. Sample delicious food, experience the vibrant culture, and explore the stunning natural landscapes

alcohol_info: The minimum age is 18 to enter an enclosure that sells alcohol beverages. Selling alcohol to a minor may incur a fine. One must provide identification upon request
Residents of Chile over the age of 18 must carry their Chilean identification card issued by the Civil Registry and Identification Service at all times

tipping.hotels: Tips are readily accepted in Chilean hotels. Tip porters 500-1000 pesos per bag, maids 1000 pesos per night and 5000-10000 pesos for the duration of your stay
tipping.guides: Guides rely on tips so be prepared to tip 5000-15000 pesos per person
tipping.restaurants: Generally tip 10% of the bill or 5% if service charge is already included
tipping.taxis: Tipping isn't customary but most drivers expect you to round up and don't give back change

weather.title: Chile's climate varies greatly due to its long stretch of land. The northern regions are arid with desert-like conditions, while the central and southern regions have a Mediterranean climate with mild, wet winters and warm, dry summers

when_to_visit.title: Off peak season
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (September to November), Autumn (March to May)
when_to_visit.short_description: Shoulder seasons offer milder temperatures and fewer crowds than summer months

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Summer season is popular for outfoor activities and offers the best opportunities for stargazing

when_to_visit.title: Best for Patagonia
when_to_visit.short_description: Warmer weather provides the best climate to explore Patagonia and southern regions for hiking, wildlife viewing and national parks like Torres del Paine. Bear in mind strong winds and weather changes do happen even in summer

when_to_visit.title: Desert exploration
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (September to November), Autumn (March to May)
when_to_visit.short_description: The Atacama Desert has little rainfall and can be visited at any time of year but spring and autumn are popular times to visit due to more moderate temperatures

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Chile is during the spring (September to November) and fall (March to May) when the weather is pleasant, and tourist crowds are smaller
